questions.question: Which Adobe application is primarily used for photo editing and manipulation?
questions.explanation: Adobe Photoshop is primarily used for photo editing and manipulation.

questions.question: Which tool in Adobe Illustrator is used to create precise paths and shapes?
questions.explanation: The Pen Tool in Adobe Illustrator is used to create precise paths and shapes.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating and publishing interactive digital documents?
questions.explanation: Adobe InDesign is used for creating and publishing interactive digital documents.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for video editing and post-production?
questions.explanation: Adobe Premiere Pro is used for video editing and post-production.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is primarily used for creating vector graphics and illustrations?
questions.explanation: Adobe Illustrator is primarily used for creating vector graphics and illustrations.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating and editing audio files?
questions.explanation: Adobe Audition is used for creating and editing audio files.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating motion graphics and visual effects?
questions.explanation: Adobe After Effects is used for creating motion graphics and visual effects.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for designing and publishing print and digital media?
questions.explanation: Adobe InDesign is used for designing and publishing print and digital media.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating and editing vector-based graphics?
questions.explanation: Adobe Illustrator is used for creating and editing vector-based graphics.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating and editing video content?
questions.explanation: Adobe Premiere Pro is used for creating and editing video content.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating and editing animated graphics?
questions.explanation: Adobe After Effects is used for creating and editing animated graphics.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for designing and editing web and mobile graphics?
questions.explanation: Adobe XD is used for designing and editing web and mobile graphics.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating and editing vector-based illustrations?
questions.explanation: Adobe Illustrator is used for creating and editing vector-based illustrations.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for creating and editing 3D models and animations?
questions.explanation: Adobe Dimension is used for creating and editing 3D models and animations.

questions.question: Which Adobe application is used for designing and publishing eBooks?
questions.explanation: Adobe InDesign is used for designing and publishing eBooks.
